Upstream: https://github.com/kairi003/Get-cookies.txt-LOCALLY
Upstream commit: 0e9952ccb1b1d914c3dc42fa496219bb7285e2dc
License: MIT (see LICENSE)
Imported on: 2026-02-28

Usage for local install (Chrome/Edge):
1. Open chrome://extensions or edge://extensions
2. Enable Developer mode
3. Click "Load unpacked"
4. Select this directory's src folder
